data.name: Focus Find
data.detailed_description:
Focus Find is an introspective journey through the 5 stages of grief.

Focus Find is a 2D puzzle platformer with a narrative based on the Kubler-Ross model of grief.

You play a floating orb, navigating your way around the 5 stages of grief and processing your emotions as you progress.

The game has been designed to be played with only 1 joystick. I tried to use the least amount of buttons possible and still create a fun, immersive experience. In doing so, the game will be accessible and approachable for gamers and non-gamers alike.
